title: All Ball - Ohio U March Madness Star Jason Preston on His Journey from Averaging 2 PPG in HS to 20 PPG in College
itunes:title: All Ball - Ohio U March Madness Star Jason Preston on His Journey from Averaging 2 PPG in HS to 20 PPG in College
description:
In this episode, we look back at Doug's conversation with Ohio University March Madness star Jason Preston who shares his incredible story on his growth from not starting and averaging 2 PPG as a high school senior to 20 PPG as an All-MAC star for the Bobcats. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
